channel.title: Ruby Mountain Recreation Areas on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: BL-80 West (Jennings Way) at Idaho St.
item.description: BL-80 West (Jennings Way) at Idaho St. Turn right to continue west on BL-80 and for Ruby Mountain Recreation Areas: Lamoille Canyon, South Fork State Park, and Ruby Valley NWR.
